description: Main entry point and routing configuration for a Flutter attendance tracker app, including Firebase initialization, environment variable loading, and placeholder screens for login, attendance, and reports.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: Root widget that sets up MaterialApp with theme, routes, and initial page.

classes.name: SplashRouterGate
classes.description: Decides navigation based on user authentication state.

classes.name: LoginScreen
classes.description: Placeholder login UI allowing user to 'sign in'.

classes.name: AttendanceScreen
classes.description: Placeholder attendance list with navigation to reports.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Application entry point; initializes environment, Firebase, and runs app.

methods.name: _initFirebase
methods.description: Configures Firebase with environment variables, sets up emulator if specified.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Build method for each widget class, creating UI layout.
